name: Offset
description: A 16-bit unsigned integer used to represent an offset in memory. Bank is implied

name: Address
description: A 24-bit unsigned integer used to represent an address in memory or a file.

name: Relative
description: A 8-bit signed integer used to represent a relative offset in memory. Bank is implied

name: RelativeLong
description: A 16-bit signed integer used to represent a relative offset in memory. Bank is implied

name: Direct
description: A 8-bit unsigned integer used to represent a direct offset in memory. Bank is implied
